answerText: denticity [do not accept "coordination number"][10] The process that forms a ring made up of a polydentate ligand and the metal atom is termed this, which is also used to treat heavy metal poisoning.
heading: DEES |2014 | Columbia A | 6 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: For EDTA, which has six donor atoms, this quantity is six.  [10] Name this quantity of a ligand which describes the number of non-contiguous atoms used to attach to a metal atom.
